duties_responsibilities.duty: Interpret and verify coverage for patients and maintain correct insurance information on patient accounts.
Conduct outbound calls to insurance companies and patients regarding insurance information.
Test claims to determine copayments and verify preferred products.
Pursue prior authorizations as determined by health plan or medical group requirements.
Maintain detailed records in the company database and ensure patient primary insurance is accurate.
Handle all inbound calls from patients and insurance companies.
Resolve denials and process appeals for private insurance and some Medicare patients.
Submit required documentation to insurance providers and handle billing orders corresponding to denials or changes.
Achieve maximum reimbursement for services provided and adapt to frequent process changes.
Attend all department, team, and company meetings as required.
Embrace and exemplify company's core values and may perform additional responsibilities or special projects as required.
Duties and responsibilities may be subject to change based on the needs of the department.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED (Associate's degree in a related field preferred)
